column1: #Text=" Kya says : " There 's no sign of her anywhere .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Why would Ikki run off like this ?
#Text=" Kya says : " I 'm guessing you 've been so busy with your " duty " to Republic City that you forgot about your duty to your kids .
#Text=" Kya says : " What are you , five years old ?
#Text=I have n't been spending enough time with them .
#Text=I wish I could be as good a father as Dad was to us .
#Text=" Kya says : " Tenzin , your problem is you 're exactly like Dad .
#Text=He was so focused on saving the world and doing his duty , do n't laugh , that he never had time for us .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Dad was under a lot of pressure .
#Text=" Bumi says : " He always had time for you , though , his precious little airbender .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Dad loved us all equally .
#Text=Besides , it all happened a long time ago .
#Text=Why are we even talking about this ?
#Text=" Kya says : " Because you seem to have some grandiose delusion that we had a perfect , happy - go - lucky childhood .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We need to keep moving if we want to find Ikki before dark .
#Text=" Kya says : " See what he 's doing there , Bumi ?
#Text=Cutting and running when things get tough !
